articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Combined Stock Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Combined Stock Farm
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Combined Stock Farm in Ungok Area.
					 He first visited the beef cattle breeding farm.
					
					 He looked round all modern processes of the farm to acquaint himself with the production of calves of good stock needed by cattle farms.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to breed more cattle of good stock high in viability and productivity in order to rapidly increase the production of beef and milk.
					
					 Then he went round the pig breeding farm.
					
					 While going round its inside and outside, he learned in detail about the breeding of pigs.
					
					 Breeding livestock is essential for stockbreeding, he said, underscoring the need to minutely organize the work to preserve and improve the characteristic features of pigs.
					
					 He then went to the goat house.
					
					 He watched with keen attention goats and sheep of new species, faster in breeding, higher in gaining in weight and higher in the quality of chevon and mutton than local ones.
					
					 He said the goats and sheep being bred on the farm are good species of high economic efficiency, calling for steadily pushing forward the work to breed and propagate those goats and sheep of good stock to suit the actual conditions of the country.
					
					 What is important in stockbreeding is to take thoroughgoing measures to ensure feed, he noted, underlining the need to successfully create pasture to produce more edible goats and sheep.
					
					 He also underscored the need to solve the issue of feed by working hard to create artificial grass fields on an extensive scale in addition to pasture.
					
					 He also visited the Institute for Domestic Animals of Good Stock of the combined stock farm.
					
					 He said that it is most important to energetically push forward scientific researches in order to put stockbreeding on a scientific and industrial basis.
					
					 He called on the farm and the relevant units to take measures to send various modern equipment needed for scientific researches and provide researchers with advanced scientific and technological information in good time.
					
					 In order to keep animal production going at a high rate it is necessary to develop scientific researches into this field, take proper veterinary and anti-epizootic measures, steadily improve the control of equipment and technical management and consistently raise the level of employees' technical skills, he added.
					
					 Noting that the combined stock farm is one of the important stockbreeding bases supplying a lot of domestic animals of good stock to other farms and producing tasty and nutritive meat and milk, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for operating the breeding farm.
					
					 He called for realizing without fail the wishes of leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul in his lifetime to provide the people with more meat, eggs, milk and other nutritive subsidiary food, expressing expectation and belief that all units would turn out in the drive to develop stockbreeding in hearty response to the Party's call for breeding grass-eating animals in a big way.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Pyong Ho and Hwang Phyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected a sub-unit under KPA Unit 552.
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of its service personnel.
					
					 He gave them a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts and had a photo session with them, expressing expectation and belief that they would defend the very dear socialist country as firm as an iron wall. 
					
					 He acquainted himself with the performance of the unit's duty and looked round the room for commanding the duty, special study room, etc.
					
					 He received a report that the sub-unit is preparing its officers and soldiers as all-round fighters capable of performing any difficult combatant duties assigned to them.
					
					 He said that the commanding officers should acquire capability to make a prompt analysis and decision on combat situation and create favorable circumstances.
					
					 He underscored the need to find out anything required for rounding off combat preparedness and take thorough measures and minutely modify and supplement combat documents so that all soldiers may be well versed in their combat duties.
					
					 Noting that unexpected circumstances may be created in a modern warfare frequently and all of a sudden, he underlined the need to be well informed about the enemy to beat him by a Juche-oriented war method.
					
					 He then acquainted himself with the management of combat and technical equipment.
					
					 He learned with deep attention about whether combat and technical equipment are always maintained in such a way as to fully display their efficiency under any difficult circumstances.
					
					 He went round a mess hall and non-staple food store of the sub-unit.
					
					 The sub-unit is included in the list of those units which did bean farming well last year, he said, adding it is good to regularly provide every soldier with at least 200g of bean every day. He called for doing bean farming well this year, too.
					
					 He visited a company of women soldiers under the sub-unit.
					
					 He looked round an education room, their bedroom, wash-cum-bath room and other places of the company to take deep care of their living.
					
					 He underlined the need to pay primary attention to politico-ideological education, noting that military service is like finishing a course of a revolutionary university.
					
					 He called for exerting efforts for strengthening the revolutionary education and class education as well as moral education, in particular, so that soldiers may successfully play their roles in society.
					
					 He watched an art performance given by soldiers of the company at the resting place.
					
					 He was very pleased to watch it, saying they are very good in their ideological and mental qualities and they do not allow any evil idea to come into their minds. That is why we say Songun culture is good, he added.
					
					 Walking the compound of the barracks reminiscent of a park, he praised the sub-unit for sprucing them up well as required by the Songun era.
					
					 He expressed the expectation that the commanding officers and soldiers would join efforts to establish strong army discipline and fully demonstrate the combatant spirit and appearance as the most elite powerful revolutionary army.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA Vice Marshal Hyon Chol Hae, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Col. General Jon Chang Bok and Hwang Pyong So and Kim Pyong Ho, vice-department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Chief of Panmunjom Mission Sends Protest Notice to US
articles.content:
Chief of Panmunjom Mission Sends Protest Notice to US
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean belligerent forces are going to stage again Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for invading the DPRK from August 20 to 31 at a time when they are becoming evermore undisguised in their hostile policy and confrontation racket against it. 
					 The situation in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity has reached an extreme pitch of tension owing to the reckless war maneuvers of the belligerent forces to be staged in different parts of south Korea in the wake of their attempted monstrous state-sponsored, politically-motivated terrorism aimed at hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are so foolish as to stage such a burlesque as sending a "prior notice" to the Korean People's Army side through the bogus "UN Forces Command" while claiming Ulji Freedom Guardian is an "annual and defensive one" in a bid to conceal its aggressive nature.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the scenario of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime to seize the DPRK by force of arms at any cost has reached a phase of full-fledged implementation.
					
					 In view of this prevailing situation, Pak Rim Su, chief of the Panmunjom Mission of the KPA, Monday sent the following protest notice clarifying the stand of the KPA to James D. Sherman, commander of the U.S.-south Korea Combined Forces:
					
					 The U.S. is now working hard to paint the aggressive and offensive nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian joint war exercises against the DPRK as "annual and defensive" while contemplating staging them together with south Korea. It is also making a serious mockery of the DPRK by sending "a prior notice allegedly based on trust and transparency".
					
					 It is hostile towards the DPRK behind the scene while publicly uttering it had no intention to invade the DPRK. Not content with this behavior, the U.S. hatched a plot to perpetrate the above-said terrorism and is escalating the war maneuvers against the DPRK. This is the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have grown stronger in their will to take revenge on the U.S.
					
					 Clear is the stand of the DPRK on the projected joint military exercises. This was fully reflected in a statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission on July 29.
					
					 Their reckless saber-rattling against the DPRK would get nothing but disgrace and self-destruction.
					
					 The DPRK once again clearly states the KPA will never deal with the "UN Forces Command" which exists in name only.
					
					 This is the reply of the KPA to the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Visits Hanoi Museum
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Visits Hanoi Museum
 Hanoi, August 6 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, visited the Hanoi Museum on Monday. 
					 Kim Yong Nam and his party were greeted by Le Quang Ba, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, officials concerned and vice curator of the museum. 
					
					 Kim looked around historical relics on display at the museum and materials dealing with the Vietnamese people's struggle against foreign invaders. 
					
					 He made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Cote d'Ivoire
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Alassane Ouattara, president of Cote d'Ivoire, on the 52nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cote d'Ivoire would grow stronger in the future, heartily wishing the president and the people of Cote d'Ivoire bigger success for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Jamaican PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Jamaican PM
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim sent a message of greeting to Portia Simpson Miller, prime minister of Jamaica, on the 50th anniversary of its independence Monday.
					 Wishing the Jamaican government and people progress and prosperity, the message expressed belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger to meet the interests and desire common to the two peoples.

articles.title: Congratulations from Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Congratulations from Bangladeshi President
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Zillur Rahman, president of Bangladesh, on August 1.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am very pleased to extend warm congratulations to Your Excellency in the name of the Bangladeshi government and people and on my own behalf on your receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the good relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Congratulations from South African Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations from South African Party Leader
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Blade Nzimande, general secretary of the South African Communist Party, on July 27. 
					 In the message Blade Nzimande extended the warmest congratulations and greetings to Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					
					 The message said that Kim Jong Un has performed great exploits for ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world to successfully realize the wishes of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal on Kim Jong Un is the reflection of the Korean people and other world revolutionary people's great admiration and reverence for you, he added. 
					
					 He, availing himself of the opportunity, sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health for the victorious advance of the world communist cause.

articles.title: German Lawmaker Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
German Lawmaker Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Michael Luther, member of Bundestag from the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, and his companion visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his patriotic, revolutionary family members at his old home, the guests looked round historic relics preserved there.
					
					 They mounted Mangyong Hill to look round historic relics.
					
					 They also visited the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, the captured U.S. armed spy ship "Pueblo", etc.

articles.title: Pyongyang Machine Equipment Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Machine Equipment Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- 2012 Pyongyang Machine Equipment Exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Monday. 
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Jong Guk, minister of Machine Industry, Kim Song Dok, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials of ministries and national institutions, delegations and delegates from different countries and regions, diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here. 
					
					 Kim Mun Jong, director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, made an opening address which was followed by a congratulatory speech by O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade. 
					
					 The speakers welcomed the delegations and delegates taking part in the Pyongyang exhibition. 
					
					 They said that the machine-building industry of the DPRK has steadily developed on the basis of latest science and technology. 
					
					 They hoped that the participants would exchange successes and experience in machine production and make good results through trade transactions. 
					
					 They expressed the will to boost cooperation with foreign countries and different regional bodies in machine production on the principle of equality and mutual benefits in the future, too. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked around exhibits presented by companies of the DPRK, Germany, Singapore, China, the Czech Republic and Taipei of China. 
					
					 The exhibition will go on until Thursday.

articles.title: Relief Activity in Anju City of DPRK
articles.content:
Relief Activity in Anju City of DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Red Cross Society of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea launched a relief work in flood-hit Anju City, South Phyongan Province.
					 Choe Yong Chol, chief of the Anju City branch of the society, told KCNA:
					
					 "Downpour swept Anju City in late July. To make it worse, water level of the river running across the city rapidly rose, affected by the high tide of the West Sea of Korea, exceeding the river's banks.
					
					 The flooding left many houses and hectares of cropland submerged and educational, healthcare and communications facilities, water supply and drainage system, roads and railways destroyed."
					
					 Kim Song Il, chief of the hygienic water team of the Red Cross Society Central Committee, said:
					
					 "A relief work to stabilize the life of flood victims is now under way in the city.
					
					 Mobile water purifiers are installed in two locations to supply drinking water.
					
					 Red Cross volunteers delivered relief supplies, including tents, quilts and daily necessities, to flood victims while conducting hygienic information activities among them to prevent possible outbreak of diseases."
					
					 The DPRK Red Cross Society is making a survey of damage in the flood-hit areas across the country, in cooperation with members of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies active in the DPRK.
					
					 It also sent reserved relief supplies to inhabitants in the afflicted areas of Kangwon, North and South Hamgyong and North Phyongan provinces and other parts of the country.

articles.title: High Temperature Persists in Korea
articles.content:
High Temperature Persists in Korea
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Most areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea had suffered from typhoon-triggered downpour from July 18, affected by seasonal rainy front.
					 However, the rainy front moved north of 40 degrees North Latitude from July 31, causing temporary stoppage of rainfall in the west coastal areas except North Phyongan Province.
					
					 Sultry weather lingers, affected by the subtropical high pressure from the northwest Pacific. 
					
					 In particular, 32 to 34 degrees Celsius have been registered in the west coastal areas from August 1, two to five degrees Celsius higher than the average year.
					
					 The high temperature is expected to continue until August 9.

articles.title: Local Industry of DPRK Makes Rapid Progress
articles.content:
Local Industry of DPRK Makes Rapid Progress
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The local industry has made steady progress in the DPRK since the Changsong Joint Meeting of Local Party and Economic Officials organized by President Kim Il Sung 50 years ago. It has been put on a new scientific and technological basis in recent years as required by the age of the knowledge-based economy.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to consolidate the material and technological foundation of the local industry as required by the building of a thriving socialist nation. The torch kindled by him to develop the local industry in the new century while providing field guidance to Changsong County, North Phyongan Province in November 2010, made the whole country alive with a drive for bringing about signal innovations and leap forward in this field.
					
					 Changsong where mountains turned into ones of treasures in the past century has become a model in developing the local industry in the era for great surge. Many local industrial factories in North Phyongan Province have been updated.
					
					 Rapid progress has been made in the local industry in cities and counties in North Hamgyong Province including Chongjin, Hoeryong and Kim Chaek cities and Kyongwon, Kilju, Myongchon and Orang counties.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province is taking the lead in the efforts to implement the party's policy on making a good use of mountains in mountainous regions and seas in the coastal regions. Riwon County on the eastern coast built by itself evaporating facilities for seawater at the soy and bean paste factory, keeping the production of soy and bean paste going at a high rate. The handicraft factory is making varieties of handicrafts including Mannyon paintings with shells, exporting them.
					
					 Jangjin County built the Kodaesan Edible Herbs Processing Factory producing pickled vegetables and dozens of varieties of processed goods including liquor and juice with edible herbs.
					
					 There are in Ryanggang Province many local industrial factories keeping their production going at a high rate on the basis of solid material and technological foundations including the Paektusan Blueberry Processing Factory, Samjiyon Soy and Bean Paste Factory, Hyesan Basic Foodstuff Factory, Kapsan Paper Mill and the Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory.
					
					 The local industrial factories in Jagang Province have been technologically updated by use of electricity generated by at least a hundred minor power stations in different parts of the province.
					
					 The number of the cities and countries managing their local economic life by their own efforts is increasing in South Phyongan and North and South Hwanghae provinces. Local industrial factories in Kaesong City are tapping their raw materials and resources.
					
					 Successes have been also reported from cities and counties of Kangwon Province as they have directed efforts to developing the local industry.
					
					 The local industry in the era of a great surge has been placed on an orbit of steady surge thanks to a high-pitched drive for developing the local industry in the new century.

articles.title: Local Industries Prove Effective in N. Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Local Industries Prove Effective in N. Hwanghae Province
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- North Hwanghae Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, has paid big efforts to operating local factories on a high level.
					 Yonthan County has computerized production processes of some factories. Its foodstuff factory has steadily boosted production after technological updating.
					
					 The county mass-produces toilet paper and Tongbaek-trademarked hair oil with locally available raw materials.
					
					 Yonsan County built a caustic soda factory by itself to supply enough caustic soda to paper and foodstuff factories in the area.
					
					 Its newly-built hydraulic power station helps operate local factories at full capacity.
					
					 Hwangju County invented a generator fueled by ultra-anthracite and rice chaff so as to supply electricity needed for production of consumer goods.
					
					 Unpha County built a shop for production of ceiling plastic sheets at its daily necessities factory.
					
					 Pongsan, Phyongsan and Sohung counties, too, are making big strides in developing local industries.

articles.title: "Pictorial Book of Korean Flora" Published in DPRK
articles.content:
"Pictorial Book of Korean Flora" Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Botanical Garden in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has brought out "Pictorial Book of Korean Flora" (1.0).
					 Contained in the e-book are more than 3,000 species of plants, including plants growing in Korea and rare plants President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il received as gifts from different countries.
					
					 The book gives detailed data on edible and medical plants and has advanced searching program that makes any user get fast access to any data.
					
					 It is helpful to scientific research and people's health.

articles.title: S. Korean Assertion about Attempted Terrorism Dismissed as Sheer Sophism
articles.content:
S. Korean Assertion about Attempted Terrorism Dismissed as Sheer Sophism
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Of late, the south Korean  intelligence service and the "Ministry of Unification" are still claiming they have nothing to do with the attempted terrorism. And the main perpetrators of the crimes to be punished are talking about "threat" and jabbering "they would not be daunted by it", even shedding tears.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is the shriek made by those criminals frightened by the will of the infuriated army and people of the DPRK to punish them. It is no more than a farce to evade the responsibility for the serious situation.
					
					 Such nonsense as "groundless claim" is a poor excuse made by those criminals and only serves as evidence proving the attempted terrorism.
					
					 The truth about the attempted terrorism was brought to light and there is enough evidence proving that the group of traitors was behind the criminals.
					
					 With no rhetoric can they deny the fact that the recent politically-prompted terrorism is an inevitable product of the inveterate hostility of the south Korean regime towards the DPRK and the extreme confrontation policy toward it.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, totally groundless is the story about "contingency" in the DPRK floated by the Lee regime.
					
					 Unshakable in any storm and stress is the dignified socialist system in the DPRK based on the single-minded unity between the leader and all his servicepersons and people. No one would find any shade of "contingency" in the country led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Disgusting, indeed, are those criminals who still talk the above-said rubbish, failing to come to their senses. Numbered are the days of these wicked renegades. Such rhetoric would not help them beg for further protection of the regime. 
					
					 The puppet regime is still busy talking nonsense to attain its ulterior aims, but it is too late for it to weather its crisis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes Danger of Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes Danger of Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is mulling staging Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with the south Korean puppet forces from August 20 to 31.
					 It is contemplating holding the exercises with the involvement of more than 30,000 U.S. aggression troops, over 56,000 south Korean puppet forces, at least 440,000 civilians and military personnel of different countries which had dispatched troops to the last Korean War under the helmet of the "UN forces". 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a vivid expression of its hostile policy toward the DPRK and a dangerous act to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The joint military exercises are an all-out war rehearsal against the DPRK from the viewpoint of military hardware and scale of forces to be involved in them and their program and nature. 
					
					 The U.S. seeks to realize its ambition to invade the DPRK by mobilizing various means and methods, but it sees the military force as the basic factor that counts.
					
					 This is clearly proved by its plan to stage the joint military exercises including the operation to break through the military demarcation line with the use of mine-proof special vehicles the way different from the past ones as well as Commander of the south Korea-U.S. Combined Forces Sherman's call for staging the exercises "based on scenario for an actual war". 
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK remains unchanged.
					
					 It is its intention to find a way out of its failed hostile policy toward the DPRK in the war against it. Herein lies the sinister intention to stage large-scale joint military exercises.
					
					 The joint military exercises will no doubt be an anti-DPRK war rehearsal making one more step close to an actual war.
					
					 We will not remain an on-looker to the serious situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					  It is an invariable stand and principle of the DPRK to approach good faith with good faith and respond to the use of force in kind.
					
					  The U.S. would be well advised to stop at once its criminal war drill, not misjudging the DPRK's principled stand.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses US of Urging Junior Allies to Facilitate Military Agreement
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses US of Urging Junior Allies to Facilitate Military Agreement
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is becoming all the more pronounced in its moves to urge Japan and south Korea to facilitate the conclusion of a military agreement between them.
					 The U.S. assistant secretary of State was reported recently to have underscored the importance of the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular alliance, asserting "the U.S. would make sustained efforts to help Japan and south Korea elevate their relations to the highest level by narrowing down their differences." He said that the "best ties between Japan and south Korea can meet the U.S. interests".
					
					 This is an open instruction given to Japan and south Korea by their American master to facilitate the formation of strategic military alliance by going beyond the conclusion of a simple military agreement. This brings to light the scenario of the U.S. to prod its stooges into building a reliable pro-American military alliance in Northeast Asia in a bid to use it as a shock brigade for carrying out its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region in contingency.
					
					 As already known, after declaring its "return to Asia", the U.S. singled out the completion of the triangular military alliance and the building of a missile shield, etc. as major tasks for implementing its new strategic plan and is busy with its moves to carrying out them as quickly as possible.
					
					 It has increased its forces in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity under the pretext of coping with "nuclear and missile threat" from someone and "its measures to bolster up combat capability." It, at the same time, has steadily imposed increasing burden for their upkeep upon the south Korean puppet regime and Japan.
					
					　In recent years, the U.S. has employed such method as urging Japan to increase its "military role" and calling on the south Korean puppet regime to tighten nexus with Japan, taking into consideration its snowballing state debts, experience in proxy war in the Middle East and pro-American stooges' rule over south Korea.
					
					　That is why the U.S. is interpreting Japan's revision of its Basic Law on Atomic Energy and the extended conception of its Pacificist Constitution, etc. from the stand that there is almost no possibility of militarist rearmament.
					
					　 It is busy letting loose a spate of balderdashes about "strategic importance" of the U.S.-Japan alliance and "importance of cooperation in the issue of the Korean Peninsula", utterly indifferent to the concern of the Korean and other Asian peoples. 
					
					　U.S., Japan and south Korea have further intensified joint nuclear war exercises.
					
					 It is the intention of the U.S. to fill up its military vacuum in the region and retain its military hegemony through Japan's increased "military role" and the final completion of the triangular military alliance based on it. Herein lies the reason why the U.S. is so zealous in backing Japan in the revival of its militarism and rearmament and facilitating the conclusion of such military agreement though it ostensibly was cautious towards the matters. 
					
					 The U.S. moves to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and the region only compel the DPRK to take the toughest stand including the bolstering of nuclear deterrent. 
						]

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's Oft-repeated "Claim" to Tok Islets
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's Oft-repeated "Claim" to Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Japan marked Tok Islets as part of its territory in the 2012 white paper for defense.
					 What merits serious attention is that the white paper, an official document clarifying the defense policy of the Japanese government, has groundlessly repeated "claim" to Tok Islets for eight years. In a word, this is nothing but a call for staging a comeback to Korea. 
					
					 Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea which has been recognized by historical evidence and international law. This fact is proved not only by Korean historical materials but by Japanese historical materials.
					
					 Japan persistently insists on the "claim" despite historical facts because it regards the islets as a point for launching its reinvasion of Korea. Such persistent "claim" of Japan is escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and forming a structure of acute confrontation between the Korean nation and Japan.
					
					 Japan's persistent wrong assertion about the islets is mainly attributable to the Lee Myung Bak regime's pro-Japanese policy.
					
					 The anti-Japanese resentment is running high among the south Koreans over the issue of the islets. This being a stark fact, the Lee group of traitors has just issued statements of regret at Japan's brigandish bid to grab the islets for the last three consecutive years. This is another sycophantic and treacherous act as it is aimed at easily abandoning part of Korea which has belonged to its territory generation after generation.
					
					 The Lee group opted for the conclusion of the General Security of Military Information Agreement, the first military agreement to be signed with Japan. This is as outrageous an act as allowing Japan to reinvade Korea and pave the way for doing so.
					
					 Japan is a criminal state which brought unspeakable misfortunes and sufferings to the Korean nation. It is, however, beautifying the bloody history of aggression against Korea and evading apology and reparation for it, far from admitting it. The Korean nation should never pardon Japan's evermore undisguised "claim" to the islets as it is an attempt to reinvade Korea in a bid to realize the old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 It is a pipedream for the descendants of the Japanese imperialists to realize their ambition for grabbing the islets with ease with the backing of the Lee group, oblivious of the lesson taught by history. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries eyeing the islets and the Lee group, its lackeys, are bound to face a stern punishment by the Korean nation.

articles.title: International Kim Il Sung Foundation Council Issues Decision
articles.content:
International Kim Il Sung Foundation Council Issues Decision
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Council of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation issued the following decision in Macao, China on August 1:
					 President Kim Il Sung is a great sage of mankind as he devoted his all to global independence and peace and people's freedom and happiness, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					 The International Kim Il Sung Foundation has rendered material and moral support and made efforts for realizing the noble intention of the peerlessly great man for the past 5 years since its inauguration was  proclaimed in October 2007, prompted by its noble mission and purpose to secure fund necessary for awarding the International Kim Il Sung Prize, studying and disseminating the Juche idea worldwide as well as developing education, public health, culture and science and technology, protecting environment and promoting peace and progress of mankind and global independence, true to the last instructions of the President.
					
					 The Foundation, together with the whole progressive mankind, will always remember leader Kim Jong Il who dedicated all his life to the building of an independent and peaceful new world and the prosperous DPRK and to the happy future of the people, true to the intention of the President.
					
					 The Foundation held the meeting of its council on August 1, 2012 and decided as follows to glorify the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and realize their life-time wishes:
					
					1. The International Kim Il Sung Foundation will be expanded and reorganized as Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.
					
					2. It will organize the council of the Foundation and elect members of the council including its co-chairman.
					
					3. The council will modify and supplement its statute, detailed rules and regulations to suit the expanded and reorganized Foundation.
					
					4. The Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation will be headquartered in Pyongyang, the capital of the DPRK.
					
					5. The Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation decides to accept the contributions from all those who hope for widespread and sustainable development of the work of the Foundation to fulfil its noble mission.

articles.title: Paper of Koreans in Japan Hails Message Sent by Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Paper of Koreans in Japan Hails Message Sent by Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), carried an editorial titled "The congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un serves as important guidelines for developing the patriotic movement as required by the new century of Juche" on August 4.
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a congratulatory message to the participants in the meeting of officials of chapters of Chongryon held to lay a springboard for ushering in a new heyday, busy as he was leading the work to improve the people's living standard and the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The message sent by Kim Jong Un serves as important guidelines for steadily developing the movement of Koreans in Japan along the road of Juche, patriotism and prosperity and an invincible treasured sword to be held tightly to usher in a new heyday of Chongryon. 
					
					 This message is a token of deep trust in all Chongryon officials including officials of its chapters.
					
					 Chongryon organizations at different levels will organize brisk study of the message which reflected his ideological and theoretical wisdom, noble virtues and love for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They will work out proper plans and take thorough steps to carry out the important tasks indicated by the message and bring about innovations in the work of their sectors and units.
					
					 All the officials including officials of Chongryon chapters will put spurs to attaining the goals of chapters' competition, the one among people of conscience to carry out the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il and a noble patriotic one for bringing happiness to the compatriots and carving out a bright future of the generations to come. 
					
					 Officials of Chongryon, chapters and branches of the women's union and members of all organizations will glorify the "2012 meeting of representatives of Chongryon branches" to be held in October with shining successes in the movement for creating patriotic models in the era of new heyday and thus make a report on victory to immortal Kim Jong Il and live up to the deep trust and care of Kim Jong Un with loyalty.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visits to Russia Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visits to Russia Marked
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Russia from July 25 to 27 to mark the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Far Eastern Region and first anniversary of his visit to Siberia and Far Eastern region of Russia. They included a seminar on his feats, Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition and book-presenting ceremony.
					 Hanging on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and seen before them were floral baskets.
					
					 Displayed there were pictures showing revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Exhibits included famous works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books, photos and fine arts introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of governments, political parties, armed forces organs, social organizations and educational, cultural and media organs and masses of the Republic of Buryatia and Maritime Territory. The consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka were present there on invitation.
					
					 The first deputy chief of the Presidential Office and the first vice-minister of Culture of the Republic of Buryatia said that the historic meeting of the top leaders of the two countries in Ulan-Ude in August last year was a great event which opened a turning phase in further developing the Russia-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 A professor of Far Eastern State University noted that Kim Jong Il was a great man produced by humankind, adding thanks to his farsightedness, wisdom, iron faith and deep knowledge the DPRK is demonstrating the might of Songun and greeting the heyday in the economy, science, culture, military affairs and all other fields.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial branch of a public chamber of veterans expressed boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the prosperity of the DPRK and global peace.
					
					 The Russia-DPRK relations will be steadily carried forward as there is the dear respected Kim Jong Un who has successfully inherited the cause of the preceding leaders, the chairman stressed.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event sponsored by the Maritime Territorial branch to congratulate him on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.

articles.title: Russian Political Parties Visit DPRK Mission
articles.content:
Russian Political Parties Visit DPRK Mission
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A Russian party delegation and a party leader paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK mission in Nakhodka on July 31. They were the delegation of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by its first secretary and the chairman of the Nakhodka Regional Committee of "A Just Russia." They visited it to congratulate the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his receiving the title of DPRK Marshal and observe the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Far Eastern Region and the first anniversary of his visit to Siberia and Far Eastern Region of Russia.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquet before a full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and made bows to them.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were conveyed to the DPRK consul general in Nakhodka by the first secretary and the chairman.
					
					 The first secretary said that under Kim Jong Un's wise leadership the DPRK has increased national defence capabilities and improved the standard of people's living amid complicated international situation.
					
					 Calling on Russian people to hold aloft the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the first secretary referred to the fact that Juche idea study organizations in Far Eastern region are changing their names into associations for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The chairman said that the conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal on Kim Jong Un was attributable to his feats, and it was a great auspicious event for not only the Korean people but all the members of "A Just Russia." It was also a historic event that gave hope to the progressive parties struggling for socialism, the chairman stressed.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from British Organization
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from British Organization
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on July 26 to congratulate the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 The statement said that the conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal on him indicates deep trust and support of the entire Korean people.  
					
					 It went on:
					
					 He is a peerlessly great man who is leading the Korean revolution to victory and the sun of Songun Korea.
					
					 The DPRK is defending the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula, resolutely defeating U.S. imperialists' provocations.
					
					 We are sure the people of the DPRK will achieve greater success in building a thriving socialist country, rallied close around him.

articles.title: War Victory Day of DPRK Celebrated in Bulgaria, Indonesia
articles.content:
War Victory Day of DPRK Celebrated in Bulgaria, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting took place in Bulgaria and a lecture in Indonesia on July 28 to mark the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were personages of the Military Medical Institute in Sofia and a company of Indonesia and other people.
					
					 A section chief of the institute recalled that in 1984 when President Kim Il Sung paid an official goodwill visit to Bulgaria, he looked up to the President, thinking that he was a genuine hero and great man.
					
					 After reading leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" he admired the profound truth of the idea which says that popular masses are the master of everything and decide everything and calls for carving out their destiny by their own efforts, the section chief said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a thriving nation as Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The director of the Indonesian company said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics, turning the DPRK into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 They developed the KPA into the defender of the country and people, pacemaker of the revolution and construction and matchless army capable of beating back any formidable enemy at one stroke.
					
					 The director expressed belief that Kim Jong Un would firmly guarantee the victory of not only the Korean people but the global independence with his Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Indian Papers Mark Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
articles.content:
Indian Papers Mark Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Indian papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 New Delhi Times on July 24 devoted one whole page to the articles titled "Iron-willed Commander" and "Warning of History" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper dealt with the fact that the President wisely led the Korean army and people with his unique military idea, outstanding commanding arts and rare strategy, tactics and war methods and thus dealt a bitter defeat to the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history.
					
					 World famous strategists praised the President as the most brilliant strategist and greatest brilliant commander, the paper said.
					
					 The July 25 issue of Indian and World Event noted:
					
					 The U.S. defeat in the Korean War helped the international community know well that no force on earth can match the army and people of the DPRK led by the President, an iron-willed commander.
					
					 Everyone, the U.S. rulers, in particular, should bear this in mind.
					
					 The DPRK at present is not the young country as it was in the early 1950s.
					
					 It has matchless army equipped with ultra-modern military hardware and reliable nuclear deterrent thanks to the Songun leadership pursued by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un whom the world praises as a man identical to the President is leading the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 If another Korean war breaks out, it will never bring the same results as it did in the last war.
					
					 The last Korean War brought about the beginning of the decline for the U.S., but new Korean War will bring a total end to it.
					
					 This is a lesson of the last Korean War to be drawn by the U.S. rulers who are working hard to launch another Korean war.

articles.title: Japanese Personages Denounce Anti-DPRK Terrorism
articles.content:
Japanese Personages Denounce Anti-DPRK Terrorism
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Japanese personages made public statements from July 24 to 27 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean regime for their attempted monstrous terrorism against the DPRK.
					 Kenki Nakamura, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, said in his statement:
					
					 It was discovered in the DPRK recently that a man was arrested while attempting to demolish statues symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK at the directive of the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea. 
					
					 The testimony made by him brought to light that the U.S. was deeply involved in the operations. 
					
					 This was a despicable action for disturbing peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula desired by the whole world and a striking expression of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 The recent case is touching off worldwide criticism as it was attempted terrorism in violation of the main spirit of the 2000 DPRK-U.S. joint communique and the September 19 joint statement in 2005. 
					
					 The world people hope for peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime should make an apology for this crime. 
					
					 Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, said that he could not repress surging indignation at the said attempted terrorism. 
					
					 The case was orchestrated by the U.S. and the south Korean regime in a bid to get rid of a tight corner after failing to stifle the DPRK by every possible means and method including economic sanctions and military pressure, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. should roll back all its hostile policies toward the DPRK and opt for having sincere dialogue with it for signing a peace treaty. 
					
					 This year marks the 59th anniversary of the signing of the Armistice Agreement. 
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to make a policy switchover. 
					
					  A peace treaty should be concluded without fail to seek the pullback of the U.S. troops, the biggest hurdle to peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Koji Ito, chairman of the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, said that he was pleased to see for himself dramatic changes in the DPRK and its happy people while attending the celebrations of the 100th Day of the Sun. 
					
					 The Korean people fully support First Secretary Kim Jong Un, he said, and went on: 
					
					 I was greatly excited to participate in the unveiling ceremony of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. 
					
					 The attempted terrorism by the U.S. and the south Korean regime can never be pardoned. 
					
					 The imperialists will never be able to subdue the Korean people united close around Kim Jong Un, the creditable successor to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It is my hope that the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea will be achieved as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita granja ganadera de la zona de Ungok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita granja ganadera de la zona de Ungok
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la Granja Ganadera Combinada de la Zona de Ungok.
					Primero, el estuvo en el centro genetico de vaca cebada.
					
					Recorriendo el centro que tiene todos los procesos modernos, se entero en detalles del estado de reproduccion de terneros de buena raza que demandan las granjas bovinas.
					
					Para incrementar trascendentalmente la produccion de la carne de res y leche en la granja, es preciso reproducir mucho mas vacas de gran viabilidad y productividad, instruyo.
					
					Seguidamente, Kim Jong Un visito el centro genetico de puerco.
					
					Recorriendo el exterior y el interior del centro, se informo en detalles del estado de cria y cuidado de ese ganado.
					
					Senalando que lo fundamental de la ganaderia es la raza reproductora, destaco la necesidad de impulsar las labores para mantener y mejorar las caracteristicas de los puercos de buena variedad.
					
					Kim Jong Un recorrio despues el corral de cabras.
					
					Alli vio con mucha atencion las cabras y ovejas de nuevas razas, cuya carne es sabrosa y reproduccion e incremento del peso son mas rapidos y altos que las razas nativas.
					
					Dijo que los ganados caprinos y ovejunos de esta granja tienen alta eficiencia economica y agrego que hay que impulsar constantemente la labor para criarlos conforme a las condiciones del pais y reproducirlos en masas.
					
					El importante asunto de la ganaderia es tomar estrictas medidas para garantizar el cebo, apunto y reitero la necesidad de crear el area de hierbas para alimentar a mas cabezas de cabras y ovejas.
					
					Al crear muchos herbazales artificiales ademas de los naturales aunque eso cueste mucho trabajo, debemos solucionar sin falta el problema de cebo, subrayo.
					
					Por ultimo, visito el instituto de ganaderia de razas optimas.
					
					La investigacion cientifica es el quehacer mas importante para asentar sobre la base cientifica la ganaderia e industrializarla, apunto.
					
					Indico que la granja y la rama interesada tienen el deber de proveer al instituto de equipos modernos necesarios a la investigacion cientifica y han de tomar las medidas para enviar a tiempo los datos de ciencias y tecnicas avanzadas.
					
					Para normalizar en alto nivel la produccion de articulos ganaderos, es necesario profundizar la investigacion cientifica de la rama, establecer un riguroso sistema de prevencion veterinaria, mejorar continuamente la administracion de equipos y la gestion tecnica y elevar constantemente el nivel tecnico y de calificacion de los empleados, senalo.
					
					La granja de Ungok es una de las importantes bases ganaderas que suministran a otras granjas mayor numero de buenos ganados reproducidos y producen la carne y leche muy sabrosas y nutritivas, dijo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la operacion del centro genetico.
					
					Tenemos que realizar a toda costa el deseo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien hizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales en su vida para alimentar al pueblo mas alimentos nutritivos como la carne, huevo, leche, etc., enfatizo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todas las unidades se movilizaran activamente en desarrollar mas la ganaderia en acato a la consigna del Partido de criar en masas los ganados herbivoros.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita de orientacion Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Pyong Ho y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Representante del EPC en Phanmunjom envia nota de protesta
articles.content:
Representante del EPC en Phanmunjom envia nota de protesta
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Justamente cuando se tornan cada dia mas brutales la politica hostil y la campana conflictiva contra la RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda traidora surcoreana, estos intentan desarrollar nuevamente del 20 al 31 de agosto los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" encaminados a la agresion a la RPDC.
					 La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la zona periferica va de mal en peor debido a esa imprudente maniobra que se realizara en todo el territorio surcoreano, antecedida por el gravisimo atentado de terrorismo politico de Estado contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					  Para disimular el caracter agresivo de la maniobra, EE.UU. la anuncia como "entrenamiento anual y defensivo" y recurre a la farsa de "avisarla previamente" a nuestra parte por conducto de la fantasmal "Comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU".
					
					  Todos los hechos evidencian que entran en la fase de implementacion la siniestra pretension agresiva de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana de ocupar a toda costa a la RPDC con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					  Dada tal situacion, el representante del EPC en Phanmunjom Pak Rim Su envio el dia 6 al "comandante de las fuerzas aliadas" Norteamericano-Surcoreanas, James D. Sherman, el siguiente aviso de protesta que expone la posicion del EPC:
					
					  En su intento de librar los ejercicios militares anti-RPDC "Ulji Freedom Guardian" con el circulo militar surcoreano, EE.UU. pretende disimular el caracter agresivo y ofensivo de la maniobra como "anual y defensivo" y se burla seriamente de la RPDC con la jugada del llamado "aviso previo basado en la confianza y transparencia".
					
					Prometer de cara a cara que no tiene la voluntad de invasion armada e idear a las espaldas el complot de terrorismo politico de Estado contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC ampliando escalonadamente los ejercicios de la guerra de agresion contra ella, he aqui la politica de EE.UU. sobre Corea.
					
					Ahora, llega al punto limite el animo del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC de vengarse de EE.UU.
					
					Esta clara la posicion de la RPDC sobre esos ejercicios militares conjuntos.
					
					Ella ya habia sido expuesta en la declaracion del portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional publicada al interior y exterior del pais el pasado 29 de julio.
					
					La verguenza y autodestruccion son lo que se obtendran con la aventura militar anti-RPDC.
					
					Dejamos en claro una vez mas que la RPDC no se trata con la nominal "Comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU".
					
					Esto es la respuesta que da nuestro ejercito a EE.UU.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam visita el Museo de Hanoi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam visita el Museo de Hanoi
Hanoi, 6 de agosto (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, visito el dia 6 el Museo de Hanoi.
					Kim y su comitiva fueron acogidos por Le Quang Ba, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam en Corea, las personalidades interesadas, el subdirector del Museo.
					
					Los visitantes recorrieron las reliquias historicas del museo y los datos de lucha del pueblo vietnamita contra los invasores extranjeros.
					
					Kim dejo letras en el libro de visitas.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim averigua la magnitud de danos que sufrio la ciudad de Anju
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim averigua la magnitud de danos que sufrio la ciudad de Anju
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, hizo conocimiento en el terreno de la magnitud de danos que ocasionaron las recientes inundaciones en la ciudad de Anju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					Las recientes lluvias torrenciales dejaron anegados y destruidos miles de viviendas, la mayoria de edificios publicos y establecimientos industriales de esa urbe.
					
					Ademas, resultaron desprendidas o enterradas de lodo muchas areas cultivables, lo cual imposibilita esperar las cosechas.
					
					En particular, la paralizacion de la red de acueducto y alcantarillado y del sistema de servicio electrico dejo sin agua potable ni electricidad a los nucleos familiares afectados.
					
					El premier convoco una reunion emergente de consulta en que se resalto la importancia de restablecer el suministro de agua potable y electricidad para estabilizar la vida de habitantes damnificados y se debatieron los problemas como concentrar las fuerzas en la recuperacion de danos definiendo bien el orden de prioridades.
					
					Choe subrayo que el Consejo de Ministros y las unidades relacionadas deben prestar profunda atencion a la campana de recuperacion y cumplir con la responsabilidad y papel que les corresponden.

articles.title: ACNC refuta el reclamo de Japon sobre el islote Tok
articles.content:
ACNC refuta el reclamo de Japon sobre el islote Tok
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Japon anoto como su territorio el islote Tok en la carta blanca de defensa para el ano 2012.
					En una palabra, ese documento oficial, que expone la politica de defensa del gobierno japones, repite por 8 anos consecutivos,  la insistencia de la posesion de la islote Tok, lo que es la teoria de nueva agresion a Corea.
					
					El islote en cuestion es reconocido historicamente y segun el derecho internacional como territorio propio de Corea.
					
					Lo comprueban los registros historicos tanto de Corea como de Japon.
					
					Sin embargo, Japon sigue insistiendo en su "soberania" sobre el Tok con el intento de usarlo como detonante de la guerra para agredir nuevamente a Corea.
					
					Tal insistencia agrava mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y crea un agudo enfrentamiento entre la nacion coreana y Japon.
					
					Practicamente, el problema del Tok acrecienta el sentimiento antijapones de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Pero, la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak se limita a publicar por 3 anos consecutivos la declaracion de lastima de igual contenido.
					
					Es otra traicion tendente a renunciar facilmente a una parte del territorio nacional.
					
					Los pasos de los traidores surcoreanos dirigidos a firmar el convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares con Japon (GSOMIA en ingles), que seria el primer acuerdo militar con Japon, son una locura que tolera y hasta facilita la reagresion de Japon a Corea.
					
					El pais isleno es el criminal que impuso a la nacion coreana indecibles desgracias y sufrimientos.
					
					No reconoce hasta la fecha su historia de agresion a Corea manchada de sangre y por el contrario, elude pedir disculpas e indemnizar haciendo apologia de ella.
					
					El reclamo de Japon sobre el islote Tok es imperdonable intento de realizar su largo sueno de la "Esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia oriental".
					
					Es irrealizable la ambicion de los descendientes de imperialistas japoneses, olvidadizos de la leccion de historia, de arrebatar el islote Tok en contubernio con los traidores surcoreanos.
					
					El islote Tok fue, es y sera siempre intocable tierra coreana.
					
					Seran castigados severamente por la nacion coreana los reaccionarios japoneses y los traidores projaponeses encabezados por Lee Myung Bak.
